text: Uye havana kupatsanuka kusara kwemushure mekunge ruzivo rwauya kwavari, nokuda kwekupfurikidza mwero pakati pavo. Uye dai risiri shoko rakauya kwavari kubva kuna Tenzi vako kwenguva yakatarwa, dai zvakagadziriswa pakati pavo izvo zvainetsa. Uye zvirokwazvo avo vakagariswa nhaka yeGwaro (Torah neVhangeri) mushure mavo (maJudha nemaKristu) vari mufungidziro zvikuru pamusoro pacho (chi Islaam)
